Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to verify the allegations made about members of the Tablighi Jamaat defecating in the open when they weren't served their desired non-vegetarian food.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the allegations made about the Tablighi Jamaat members are true without providing substantial evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The police investigation found the claims to be untrue, suggesting that there may be alternative explanations or misinformation surrounding the incident.
